title.en: Aspiration to Be Cared for in Every Lifetime

text.en: All the victorious buddhas of past, present and future
text.en-trans: dü sum shekpé gyalwa tamché kun

text.en: Appear to us in the form of the supreme spiritual guide,
text.en-trans: rang ngor shenyen chok gi kur nangwa

text.en: Unmatched in kindness, a treasury of oceanic qualities—
text.en-trans: kadrin tsung dral yönten gyatsö ter

text.en: Wish-fulfilling jewel, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: yizhin norbu khyé la solwa deb

text.en: As you manifest all manner of activity,
text.en-trans: khyé kyi drodül tabkhé chöpa ni

text.en: Employing various skilful means to tame beings,
text.en-trans: nampa natsok ji tar ten jé kyang

text.en: Bless me so that I do not develop wrong views even for an instant
text.en-trans: ké chik tsam yang lok ta mi kyé war

text.en: And perceive all that you do as perfect!
text.en-trans: ji dzé lekpar tongwar jin gyi lob

text.en: Of the excellent advice that you have lovingly imparted
text.en-trans: gang gi tse war dampé sung zang lé

text.en: I shall not disobey even so much as a single word;
text.en-trans: tsik zur tsam yang gongpar mi ché ching

text.en: Just like the contents of one vase poured into another,
text.en-trans: pumpa gang jöi tsul gyi chin lap kun

text.en: Let all your blessings be transferred into me!
text.en-trans: ma lü dak gi gyü la powar shok

text.en: O Protector, as you display various enlightened forms
text.en-trans: gön khyö dak dang ma dak zhing nam su

text.en: In pure and impure realms of existence,
text.en-trans: na tsok trulpé rol gar ngompé tsé

text.en: May I be born as your foremost attendant,
text.en-trans: dak kyang khyö kyi zhab drang chok gyur né

text.en: So that we may act together to bring about awakening!
text.en-trans: chang chub chö la nyam du jukpar shok

text.en: Precious lord, when you display the act of enlightenment
text.en-trans: nam zhik rang nang dakpé zhing chok tu

text.en: In a sublime, self-appearing pure realm,
text.en-trans: jé khyö ngön tsang gyawé tsül tön tsé

text.en: May I take my place among the first of your disciples,
text.en-trans: dak kyang düpa dangpö dral khö dé

text.en: And act supremely to further your enlightened deeds!
text.en-trans: trinlé pelwé jepo chok tu mön

text.en: In short, from now onwards throughout all my future lives,
text.en-trans: dor na da né kyewa tamché du

text.en: May I never be apart from you, my one true refuge,
text.en-trans: kyab chik dampa khye dang mi dral zhing

text.en: And even once I attain enlightenment, may you be the lord of my family,
text.en-trans: chang chub tob kyang rik kyi dakpo ru

text.en: As we empty the realms of ordinary beings from their depths!
text.en-trans: gyur né dro kham dong né trukpar shok
